comment: @Reuters This is ridiculous, the virus can't travel miles on open roads

@Reuters The world needs to heed this virus. This is bad for the world. What’s the plan? It’s out there now and it won’t stop, this is going to spread worldwide, we need to know what is really going on to stop it?

@Reuters Be careful, you arrest someone for their opinion, and then one day it's you.  China has created a 'fake new law'... Do you trust China to decide what's fake news and what's real news?  This fake news movement may be exploited by certain governments to prevent free speech.
@Reuters Heaven forbid people can inform themselves when the Chinese Government has lies and propaganda it needs to spread.#CoronaVirus#CoronavirusOutbreak
